## Recovery Bay Summary

```{r}
library(ggplot2)
library(plotly)

data <- data.frame(
  Category = c("A", "B", "C", "D"),
  Value = c(10, 23, 15, 8)
)

p <- ggplot(data, aes(x = Category, y = Value)) +
  geom_bar(stat = "identity") +
  theme_minimal() +
  labs(title = "Simple Bar Chart",
       x = "Category",
       y = "Value")

ggplotly(p)
```
